article_title: '60 Minutes' Just Called Obamacare A Disaster. Here's What They Didn't Tell You.

article_metadata.description: 60 Minutes on Sunday ran an eye-raising exposé of the health law's many shortcomings — or as correspondent Lesley Stahl called the segment, "What Obamacare Doesn't Do." Unfortunately, when it came to telling a complete story about the Affordable Care Act, there was a lot that 60 Minutes itself didn't do. That's [...]
article_metadata.author: Dan Diamond
